long_description: Aluminum Profile Century aerobars make it easy to get into aero position when you're out training or racing. They boast easy, clip-on mounting and width adjustment of the arm pads for a great value. 1-piece aluminum design is sturdy and lightweight. Arm pad width can be adjusted to optimize comfort. Clip-on mounting brackets fit both 26.0 and 31.8 mm handlebars.
short_description: Aluminum Profile Century aerobars make it easy to get into aero position when you're out training or racing. They boast easy, clip-on mounting and width adjustment of the arm pads for a great value.
